Package minet.layer

package minet.layer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    minet.layer.init
     
  • Class
    Description
    Layer
    An interface for all layers.
    Linear
    A class for linear layers (Y = XW + b)
    ReLU
    A class for ReLU layers (rectified linear unit) y = x if x > 0 else 0.
    Sequential
    A sequential container, containing a sequence of layers.
    Sigmoid
    A class for sigmoid layers y = 1 / (1 + exp(-x)).
    Softmax
    A class for softmax layers y[i] = exp(x[i]) / sum_j exp(x[j]).
    Tanh
    A class for sigmoid layers y = 1 / (1 + exp(-x)).
